item.title: Jamie add a quote by Jamie Wyman
item.description: "When the person with a chokehold on your soul says, “Jump,” you pack your parachute and hope for a soft landing." -- Jamie Wyman

item.title: Jamie add a quote by Jamie Wyman
item.description: "Magic pants?” “Without them I’m starkers,” he mused. “Shall I show you?” “No, I think I prefer the pants." -- Jamie Wyman

item.title: Jamie add a quote by Jamie Wyman
item.description: "His skin like grey bark, his eyes pale as a winter pool, time and age had worn my father to the bone. In our youth, he’d been a strict master lording over my lessons while tender with the flower of his heart, my sister Anabine. Ana, the lovely, blooming jewel. Zyndel, she of clever wit." -- Jamie Wyman

item.title: Jamie add a quote by Jamie Wyman
item.description: "Never underestimate the short attention span of a satyr." -- Jamie Wyman

item.title: Jamie add a quote by Jamie Wyman
item.description: "Stabbing someone from the front is far more difficult than stabbing them in the back." -- Jamie Wyman

item.title: Jamie add a quote by Jamie Wyman
item.description: "You are a pawn and a tool,” he said. “But you’re the right one for the job. For that, I am sorry." -- Jamie Wyman

item.title: Jamie add a quote by Jamie Wyman
item.description: "Some are born to greatness,” Flynn gestured to himself. “Others…” He eyed Marius. “Well, then there are just others." -- Jamie Wyman

item.title: Jamie add a quote by Jamie Wyman
item.description: "I didn’t answer the naked hunger in his eyes." -- Jamie Wyman

item.title: Jamie add a quote by Jamie Wyman
item.description:
"I won’t be your pawn,” I growled.
Puck’s lips formed a thin, knowing grin. “In the end, you’ll still serve the Fae." -- Jamie Wyman

item.title: Jamie add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "When everything goes to hell, the people who stand by you without flinching -- they are your family. " -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Jamie add a quote by jamie wyman
item.description: "Marius, where are my pants?” His grin widened. “Wouldn’t you like to know?" -- jamie wyman
